text: I have created an email template in HubSpot and i am passing data to it , everything is working fine but loop on associative array  is not working on it

Hi guys, Any idea if we can make the Stripe Tax feature work for HubSpot quotes? Or perhaps just introduce a custom payment link based on the Quote being built via a Custom Template and connect with API?

did you get any help with this? i am having this issue too. we had a custom preferences page set up using some custom properties eg `{{contact.subscription_type}}` . It used to work fine but have just noticed it is only working on some contacts now. When it's not working it is only showing the owner property in `{{contact|pprint}}`
